questions: Is there a black cat in the image?
Is there a white cat in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: a black cat sits on a window sill, a white cat lies beneath the sill?
model_output:
yes There is a black and white cat in the image.
no There is no entirely white cat in the image; the cat has black fur as well.
no The image does not show a black cat sitting on a window sill and a white cat lying beneath it; there is one black and white cat lying on the window sill.
